text: Hi! So basically what our client wants to do is export Company1's website from their HubSpot account and transfer it over to Company2's HubSpot account under a subdomain (<http://company1.company2.com|company1.company2.com>)

How would we go about doing this? Or would it be easier to recreate Company1's website on the new account? There's still some things we have to figure out from a design/development standpoint, but I just wanted to get as much information on all of the options
if the site was built outside of HubSpot, you will need to recreate it.

<@U02J3EFR2MB> I hav e done this before, and it is a pretty involved process. In order to get it done, you'll need to use a combination of the CLI and the CMS APIs as well as (unfortunately) some manual recreation for certain tools like CTAs which lack an API.
